delete [select id from Account where name like 'SURVEY Account%'];
//if required delete contacts from contact object where name like SURVEY

//Create Accounts
List<Account> accList = new List<Account>();
for(integer i=1; i<70 ; i++) {
   Account acc = new Account(Name ='SURVEY Account ' +i,Data_ExternalID__c='SURVEY Account ' +i);
   accList.add(acc);
}
//Account acc360 = new Account(Name ='SURVEY Account 360',Data_ExternalID__c='SURVEY Account 360');
//   accList.add(acc360);
   
insert accList;

//Add Accounts to Customers
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = [SELECT id FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Status' AND
                                 JBCXM__SystemName__c = 'ActiveCustomer'];
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> custList = new List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c cust = null;
for(Account acc : [SELECT id FROM Account where name like 'SURVEY Account%']) {
            cust = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c(JBCXM__Account__c  = acc.id, JBCXM__Status__c  = (pkList.get(0)).id);
			custList.add(cust);
    
}

insert custList;

List<Account> accLists = new List<Account>();
Account account = new Account(Name ='SURVEY Account 360',Data_ExternalID__c='SURVEY Account 360');
accLists.add(account);
insert accLists;
